DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy , tolerance safety tacrolimus 0.03 % ointment treatment intractable allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Tacrolimus 0.03 % Ointment Intractable Allergic Conjunctivitis : An Open Label Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Subjects include > 5 year old suffer intractable allergic conjunctivitis pregnancy breastfeeding , history herpetic eye disease , transplant patient concomitant administration drug inhibit cytochrome CYP3A4 , hypersensitivity macrolides
